detaileddescription.para: Randomness strength. The random field is uniformly distributed in (-w,w)
Energy offset for this mpo (to make "reduced" MPO views)

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Tensor< Scalar, 4 > MPO, std::vector< double > parameters) override
memberdef.name: set_hamiltonian

detaileddescription.para: Builds the MPO hamiltonian as a rank 4 tensor. Notation following Schollwöck (2010)
H = - Σ J sz_{i} sz_{i+1} + g_{i} sx_{i}

memberdef.argsstring: (int position, int sites, std::vector< Eigen::MatrixXcd > &SX, std::vector< Eigen::MatrixXcd > &SY, std::vector< Eigen::MatrixXcd > &SZ) const override
